meanings.definition: Short and stout in build; squat
meanings.sent1: The dumpy puppy waddled around the yard.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about her dumpy figure.
meanings.sent3: The dumpy little car chugged along the road comically.
meanings.sent4: The dumpy house seemed to huddle against the storm.
meanings.sent5: The dumpy tree stump stood like a chubby guardian in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The dumpy old couch sagged in the middle.
meanings.sent2: She refused to wear the dumpy dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: Despite its dumpy look, the old teddy bear held sentimental value.
meanings.sent4: The dumpy building loomed sadly in the dim light.
meanings.sent5: The dumpy scarecrow slouched in the field, scaring no crows at all.

meanings.definition: To throw or dump something in a careless manner
meanings.sent1: He dumpy his clothes on the floor after a long day.
meanings.sent2: Please don't dumpy the trash in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: She dumpy her backpack on the chair with a thud.
meanings.sent4: The workers dumpy the gravel into the pit with loud clangs.
meanings.sent5: The chef dumpy the ingredients into the pot, creating a delicious aroma.
